General.Name: Kidswant Children Products Co.Ltd.
General.Description: Kidswant Children Products Co.,Ltd. engages in the retail of maternal, infant, and child products in China. The company sells food, clothing, and consumables through offline direct-sale stores and online channels. It also provides childcare, advertising, and online platform services. The company was formerly known as Kid King Children's Products (China) Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Kidswant Children Products Co.,Ltd. in May 2016. Kidswant Children Products Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Nanjing, China.
